title: error 004 (or unpecified error occured) HELP PLZ
body:
most of my friends are having the same problem while patching,on the beta clinet(new) it said error 004.
I have reintalled lol and on the lagacy client I had the error that told me to check my logs (unspecified error)
please riot help me it's been 2 weeks since I last played

replies.body:
Seeing that 004 error while trying to patch is a good sign that your OS is blocking League from scanning the game files to update properly. If League is being blocked from updating, we need to take a look over your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). 

Make sure to go over each of those steps, but let me know if they don't seem to help!
